entries.journal_entry_description: Han Solo mentioned that there are 3 combat experts in Tansarii Point Stataion that can teach you how to survive in combat. Two are located in the Ranged Combat Training Room and the third is in the Close Combat Training Room.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Loche Crestingsky can teach you all about marksmanship. Talk to him in the Ranged Combat Training Room next to the Medical Bay.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Talk to Loche Crestingsky in the Ranged Combat Training Room
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Rydel can teach you all the basics of melee combat. Talk to him in the Close Combat Training Room, next to the Medical Center.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Talk to Rydel Delan in the Close Combat Training Room
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Raylen Finn can teach you about hunting. Talk to him in the Ranged Combat Training Room next to the Medical Center.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Talk to Raylen Finn in the Ranged Combat Training Center
entries.task04_task_display_string_1: Talk to Raylen Finn in the Ranged Combat Training Center
entries.task04_task_display_string_2: Talk to Rydel Delan in the Close Combat Training Room
entries.task04_task_display_string_3: Talk to Loche Crestingsky in the Ranged Combat Training Room
